message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a wide range of features that ensure both efficiency and comfort. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $80. Would you be interested in purchasing it at this special introductory price of $95?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the features you've mentioned. I'd like to propose a price of $80 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product, but due to the costs involved in production and distribution, I cannot agree to $80. I would like to suggest a counteroffer of $90, which still represents a discount from our regular price. I believe this offers a fair compromise. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $85. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.

I appreciate your offer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to consider $87 as a counteroffer. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing for a reasonable profit margin. I hope this proposal works for you.
